text: Bernhard Pickl (born 3 March 1991) is an Austrian sport shooter. He participated at the 2018 ISSF World Shooting Championships, winning a medal.300 m team rifle 3 positions results ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:Austrian male sport shooters Category:ISSF rifle shooters Category:People from Scheibbs District Category:European Games competitors for Austria Category:Shooters at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games medalists in shooting Category:European Games silver medalists for Austria Category:Sportspeople from Lower Austria
title: Bernhard Pickl
